## Texture2DProps interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Texture2DProps extends WithContext 
```
<b>Extends:</b> WithContext

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./webgl.texture2dprops.height.md) | number | The textures height in pixels. |
|  [levels?](./webgl.texture2dprops.levels.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The amount of mipmap levels. Level 0 represents the original texture. |
|  [storageFormat?](./webgl.texture2dprops.storageformat.md) | [TextureStorageFormat](./webgl.texturestorageformat.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> How the data is stored in GPU memory. |
|  [width](./webgl.texture2dprops.width.md) | number | The textures width in pixels. |
